mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We help travelers navigate the complex world of visa requirements with minimal hassle. Our mission is to simplify international travel by providing comprehensive visa information, eligibility checking, and seamless application services.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.centralized_description: We collect your documents and provide a comprehensive list of destinations available for your specific situation.
solution.rapid_description: We handle the visa application process for you or connect you with trusted visa service agencies.
solution.catalog_description: Access destination-driven, informative content that helps you understand everything about visa requirements for each country.

objectives.title: Our Objectives
objectives.help_travelers: Help users travel with minimal or no visa processing complications
objectives.simplify_process: Simplify the visa application process through technology and expertise
objectives.provide_information: Provide accurate, up-to-date visa information for all destinations
objectives.connect_services: Connect travelers with trusted visa service providers

why_choose.title: Why Choose Us
why_choose.trust: Trusted by thousands of travelers worldwide
why_choose.global: Global reach with comprehensive destination coverage
why_choose.support: Expert support throughout your application process

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team. We're here to help you with your visa questions and travel planning needs.

form.title: Send us a message
form.message_placeholder: Please provide details about your inquiry...

questions.title: Questions About Visa Requirements?
questions.description: Our team of visa experts is ready to help you understand the requirements for your destination and guide you through the application process.

partnerships.title: Partnership Opportunities
partnerships.description: We're always looking to partner with travel agencies, visa service providers, and tourism organizations to better serve travelers worldwide.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At GetTravelVisa.com, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.

information_collection.title: Information We Collect
information_collection.personal_description: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, passport details, and travel preferences when you use our services.
information_collection.usage_description: We automatically collect information about how you interact with our website, including IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time spent on our site.
information_collection.cookies_description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and provide personalized content.

information_use.title: How We Use Your Information
information_use.provide_services: To provide and maintain our visa information and application services
information_use.communicate: To communicate with you about your inquiries and provide customer support
information_use.improve_services: To improve our website and services based on usage analytics
information_use.marketing: To send you promotional emails about our services (with your consent)
information_use.legal_compliance: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

information_sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
information_sharing.service_providers: We may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing services
information_sharing.legal_requirements: We may disclose your information when required by law or to protect our rights and safety
information_sharing.business_transfers: In the event of a merger or acquisition, your information may be transferred to the new entity
information_sharing.consent: We will not share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent, except as described in this policy

data_security.title: Data Security
data_security.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

your_rights.title: Your Rights
your_rights.access: Right to access your personal information
your_rights.deletion: Right to request deletion of your information
your_rights.objection: Right to object to processing of your information

contact_privacy.title: Contact Us About Privacy
contact_privacy.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@gettravelvisa.com.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to GetTravelVisa.com. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By using our website and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Policy.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: GetTravelVisa.com provides visa information, eligibility checking, and visa application assistance services. We are not a government agency and do not issue visas directly.
services.information_only: The information provided on our website is for informational purposes only and should not be considered as legal advice.
services.accuracy: While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, visa requirements can change frequently, and we cannot guarantee the accuracy of all information.

user_responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
user_responsibilities.accurate_info: You must provide accurate and complete information when using our services
user_responsibilities.compliance: You are responsible for complying with all applicable laws and regulations
user_responsibilities.verification: You must verify all visa requirements with official government sources before traveling
user_responsibilities.prohibited_use: You may not use our services for any illegal or unauthorized purposes

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.no_guarantee: We do not guarantee visa approval or processing times
disclaimers.third_party: We are not responsible for the actions or services of third-party visa service providers
disclaimers.changes: Visa requirements and processing procedures may change without notice
disclaimers.liability: Our liability is limited to the extent permitted by law

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.ownership: All content on our website, including text, images, logos, and software, is owned by GetTravelVisa.com or our licensors
intellectual_property.restrictions: You may not copy, distribute, or reproduce our content without written permission
intellectual_property.trademarks: All trademarks and service marks are the property of their respective owners

limitation_liability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation_liability.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, GetTravelVisa.com shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from your use of our services.

governing_law.title: Governing Law
governing_law.description: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where GetTravelVisa.com is registered.

changes_terms.title: Changes to Terms
changes_terms.description: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website.

contact_terms.title: Contact Us About Terms
contact_terms.description: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at legal@gettravelvisa.com.
